directions.step:
CHILL APPLESAUCE PRIOR TO SERVING. START WITH 3 #10 CAN AND REPLENISH ONE CAN AT A TIME AS NEEDED. PLACE IN A SUITABLE CONTAINER AND GARNISH BEFORE PLACING ON THE COLD SERVING LINE. POST THE AMOUNT USED TO THE KITCHEN REQUISITION AND RETURN WORKSHEET.
Recipe Number: S00107
SERVING SIZE: 1 SERV
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
